subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Luke Donald moved a step closer to the No. 1 ranking, shooting a six-under-par 65 to take the lead after two rounds at The Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
snippet: Luke Donald moved a step closer to the No. 1 ranking, shooting a six-under-par 65 to take the lead after two rounds at The Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
